name: Casa Benigna
address: Calle Benigno Soto, 9, 28002 Madrid, Spain
review: Casa Benigna and its staff were absolutely wonderful! It was recommended to me by a Madrileño friend as having the best rice, and that was totally accurate..... EAT HERE IMMEDIATELY! I cannot recommend this quaint restaurant enough!The staff is amazing, caring and genuine. Impeccable service. They treat you like.... Great food and outstanding service-good interiors My husband and i came for pre birthday dinner and not only enjoyed the food but the owners were so....

name: Diverxo
address: Calle Padre Damián, 23, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
Diverxo is one of the most memorable, mindfuck meals I've had in my life. Highlight of my year and my trip, and Top 5 meals of my life so far.

If you're on.... I came in with lofty expectations and they just weren't met.  Ambiance and service were top notch.

Pace of the meal was too long, but it almost had to be.... Wonderful dining experience.  Food as art.  Finesse to the extreme.  Every flavor one can imagine.  Wine pairing was best ever. Nine unique and perfectly....

name: Asador Donostiarra
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 79, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
Stayed in Madrid for 8 days. Must have tried 15 different restaurants. NOTHING I MEAN NOTHING compares to A Donoatria. The service, the food THE FOOD!!!!.... Another Madrid gem to be discovered. Bask country style in Madrid financial and business area. Great Menu. Nice and generous portions
Excellent for business.... Great place. The quality of the ingreafiebts is exceptional. Traditional asador Spanish food. Ceremonial serving. Familiar to Real Madrid players..

name: L'Albufera
address: Calle Poeta Joan Maragall, 43, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Love this place, we have been here a few times over the years. A few of us went back in February. We ended up getting a Seafood Paella. The Paella was.... Wonderful restaurant.  Best paella I've had in Madrid.  Tapas were good, with the mushrooms being my favorite.  Paella was moist, lots of seafood, and a.... Located in the basement of the Melia hotel this is an amazing place to come for paella in Madrid. It is rated by the locals as the best paella is Madrid and....

name: Tierra
address: Calle de San Germán, 12, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: If you are an American looking for an identical version of Chipotle or Tex Mex, then you have come to the right place.  They serve you big portions and the.... I've been to the Tierra by Dubliners in Sol and I didn't know they sold margaritas at bigger locations! My friend and I were on the prowl for a cheap.... Great atmosphere in downtown Madrid!  The employee preparing my meal quickly picked up that I was more comfortable with English and presented all options....

name: De María
address: Calle Félix Boix, 5, 28036 Madrid, Spain
review:
Our local coworker took us for a dinner here and I loved the ambiance (open air) and service (attentively yet not intrusive).  The steak was amazing cooked.... We brought the family here on a Sunday night. We arrived at their opening at 9pm. They have great service. I would definitely recommend you trying this.... Was very close to Charmartin train station and stumbled upon it. Very generous portions. Almost missed my train trying to finish meal.
The servers were....

name: Matcha
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 62, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: This place for lunch was awesome!!! Not only the service but the food! They served us very quickly with each plate and we were even able to sit and have tea.... As an American sushi connoisseur, I recommend this to all levels of sushi lovers. The sushi beyond fresh, service is quick and friendly, and the menu is....

name: Goiko Grill
address: Avenida del General Perón, 16, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: One amazing burger , yummy from beginning to end. I think I had the one with goats che ese. I picked it was close to home, on Alberto Alcocer.. Friendly greeting and attentive young staff although an empty restaurant with Reserved signs on every table didn't give a great first impression ... such is....

name: La Chalana
address: Paseo de La Castellana, 179, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: This restaurant is absolutely phenomenal whether you are looking for typical Spanish food or fresh seafood! The restaurant is pretty upscale and a bit.... Came here for dinner on our last night in Madrid. Found it through Yelp (thanks guys)! Everything was fantastic! We ended up getting the 3 course dinner for.... The best place for a good and affordable evening with friends or a date. They have great deals if you eat at the bar ( 6 glasses of sidra and 12 longostine....

name: Alfredo's Barbacoa
address: Calle de Juan Hurtado de Mendoza, 11, 28036 Madrid, Spain
review:
Delicious food and a friendly environment.

The burgers are particularly worth trying, they are possibly the best I've had in Madrid. The chili is also.... I will never return to this restaurant again, not because of the food (which was good for Spanish standards), but because of the offensive decoration. The.... Best burgers I found during my summer in Spain. Questionable decore (confederate flags and KKK references), but aside from that, the best coleslaw I've ever....

name: New York Burger
address: Calle del General Yagüe, 5, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: I came here with a friend who promised me the best burgers in town. The burgers themselves were decent, but quite frankly were nothing to write home about..... Found this place on a local TV show so decided to give it a shot. Have ordered the Empire State and the Soho, both well done and got a bleeding medium rare....

name: La Cantina de la Estación
address: Calle de Sor Angela de la Cruz, 17, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
Asturian restaurant in Madrid (not Austrian, Asturias is a region in Spain). 

I was staying in this district a month ago and found the place on Google.... Great food! What looked to be a hole in the wall offered quite an exquisite menu. My only regret is that there were no true tapas options to try more than.... Charming local place with many locals enjoying a Tuesday night. Excellent atmosphere, good, drinks and service. We may come back even though we only have a....

name: Casa Juan
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 111, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Great restaurant for groups. They have set menu that makes life super easy for all and really helps the group enjoy the meal as a group. They serve several.... Just had a wonderful dinner at this incredible restaurant. Started with the white asparagus salad, served with a light mayonnaise. Very fresh tasting and.... Very nice atmosphere with excellent food to match. There were 3 different meal menus available to suit different tastes and costs. As a couple we had the....

name: Nitty Gritty
address: Calle Doctor Fleming, 51, 28036 Madrid, Spain
review:
My favoirite place in Madrid. The staff is so kind and the food is amazing!
Every time we come to Madrid we visit Nitty Gritty and it has always been the.... A neat, well decorated place hidden away on a side street. The atmosphere is very rustic with the selections of table tops, chairs, and silverware. The.... Great place. Food was top-notch (had the sirloin (somillo)) and not too expensive. Decor and ambiance are great, if seemingly trying a *bit* too hard to be....

name: Vaca Nostra
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 257, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: We were in Spain on holiday and received a recommendation from the concierge of the Eurostar Tower Hotel (see review) we were staying at. For those of you.... Incredible view. Good food. Try the home made tacos. I know it's not what you'd expect but they were lovely..

name: La Antequerana
address: Calle de Sor Ángela de la Cruz, 30, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: Naked & Sated
address: Calle Estébanez Calderón, 3-5, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
This review is for another outpost. ( maestro Victoria). I've been to 2 in the Madrid main city areas and this is a good chain. 

Galette: buckwheat crepe..... I have no pictures of my first meal here.  I ordered their vegan pizza.  Of course, I ordered vegan cheese and once the pizza was plated for me.  I noticed.... As a tourist I highly recommend this place as a lighter alternative to traditional Spanish cuisine that still maintains the experience of Spanish food.....

name: Home Burger Bar
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 210, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: Really, one of the best hamburgers in the world. The claim is absolutely true (to be amongst the best 50 burgers in the world). If you are in Madrid and....

name: Rubaiyat
address: Calle de Juan Ramón Jiménez, 37, 28036 Madrid, Spain
review: Great place to eat in the area. Can't say nicer things. Madrid cuisine is hit or miss, one really needs to use Google reviews or Yelp to find that perfect.... Excellent food and excellent service! Mushroom app and then the Kobe beef for two was delicious. Bread and several delicious dipping sauces comes with the.... Rubaiyat is not for tourists.  Here, in the high-rent district, near P. Castilla, you're more likely to run into a PE investor or banker taking his or her....

name: New York Burger
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 89, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: Quick and convenient stop for a lunch near our hotel.  Burgers were not overly seasoned, but they were cooked to the correct temp we chose.  Crispy fries.... My favorite burger place. However decided to go for the brisket this time. It was amazing.. Three stars that's should've been four. Ordered the Bronx medium and it came out fairly rare. Probably my own fault, but communication and all. The parts....

name: Don Lisander Trattoria
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 92, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: Shangai Mama
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 62, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: From talking with the stuff it appears that this area was the old "China town" where the first Chinese restaurant in Madrid opened.  Now enough with history.... We went for dinner and we absolutely loved it! We ordered a bunch of plates and were absolutely satisfied, the portions were generous and tasty. The food....

name: Santceloni
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 57, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: This is a two star Michelin restaurant. Every morsel of food was delicious. Why four stars? The Sommelier was awful. He seemed like he was bothered to have.... Santceloni was the capstone of our three week vacation through Spain and Portugal and it ended our honeymoon on a high note! The restaurant provided us with.... Restaurant Santceloni is located in the chic Hesperia Hotel. Santceloni holds two Michelin stars.  It was an incredible experience. The dining room was....

name: 5 Cucharas
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 115, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: La Vaca
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 214, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: Food was delicious and amazing service! We were very pleased and impressed with this place during our visit to Madrid!. The food there is delicious, we had tried several places in Madrid,  when we visit last year. It is difficult to find a good steak house in Madrid. We are....

name: St. James
description: Spanish Tapas/Small Plates Tapas Bars Modern European
address: Calle Rosario Pino, 14, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
Maybe the best Seafood Paella cooked with Bomba rice  at St. James - Gastro James Rosario.

Service rocks and love the ambiance of the restaurant.. Great place for a relaxed paella.  Go here when out of town guest want paella.  They also tend to have discounts on ElTenedor making it more affordable..

name: Kabuki
address: Avenida del Presidente Carmona, 2, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Great service and pretty good sushi for Madrid! Nice atmosphere, quiet, chic, good wine and saki list.. Incredibly fresh sushi. Al fresco dining option offered. Fills up quickly with businessmen and women during lunchtime. Strongly recommend making a.... Good food and service. The place was a little noisy for my friends but the service and the food is fantastic.

name: Piccola Napoli
address: Calle Palencia, 29, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
While vacationing in Madrid, my friend and I were craving an Italian dinner. We did our usual Yelp search and found this Italian restaurant. Never have I.... Stopped by to grab a bite after spending the morning at the museum. 

It took the waiter quite a while to take our order, even though the restaurant was.... Best pizza in Madrid! True and authentic Partenopean pizza, and high quality Italian dishes like pasta. The prices are reasonable and in general it's always....

name: Irish Rover
address: Avenida de Brasil, 7, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
The Irish Rover Pub is a blast! My girlfriend and I stopped by here after dinner a few weeks ago just to get our night started and take some shots. I.... Terrible Guinness stew and fish and chips. Stew was watery; nothing like Guinness Stew in Ireland. Fish had too much batter, greasy and no flavor.
Service.... I gave my score after all was done to be fair!

So far first impressions not the best, sat at the bar and waited 15 minutes before someone came over. Not....

name: Taxi a Manhattan
address: Calle de la Basílica, 17, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Lovely place, albeit a bit hard to find if you're unfamiliar with the Chamartin-Chamberi districts. The interior ambiance is a bit dark, which helps.... I went to this place when they first opened last year and the food was very disappointing and so was the service. We came back again this weekend forba.... Nice ambiance, but brutally unorganized and slow service. Not only slow, but they also forget. If you have a lot of time and patience then ok. Not my cup of....

name: La Maquina
address: Calle Sor Ángela de la Cruz, 22, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Do not miss this fine seafood experience on your next visit to Madrid! We enjoyed the delicious appetizers and entrees.. Dinner was delicious - main course was the best perfect combination of flavored. Very relaxed and comfortable atmosphere.. I dinner here, in the "barra" and ate a very good tuna tartar and a lovely "pulpo a gallega". Recommend for a nice and relaxed dinner..

name: Asador de Aranda
address: Plaza Castilla, 3, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: My partner and I loved this place. We had the quarter serving of lamb and pork and it was AWESOME. Meat was fork tender and well seasoned. Service was very.... First stop while visiting Madrid. I thought full menu will be halal but once we got there, waiter told us oh lamb is. So we ordered lamb chops and 1/4 lamb....

name: La Garriga
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 153, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: La Garriga is your neighborhood spot while you are in Spain.  No one speaks English here and there is no translated menu.  The food, wine, and ambiance are.... This place is a small deli style cafe. They had an assortment of cheeses and meats.  I got a cappuccino and small jamon and cheese baguette. The bread is.... Very good place to eat a nice Jamon Iberico. I tried Cava and enjoyed a lot. If you want to take home some jamon or manchego cheese you can buy there to..

name: Tasca La Farmacia
address: Calle Poeta Joan Maragall, 19, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: What a great find! Friday night, 9p, a little crowded but there was standing room at the bar for me to have dinner. Luckily I previously downloaded their.... The four of us found Tasca La Farmacia at Calle Capitan just a couple of blocks away from the Meliá Madrid hotel on our first day in Spain. Very attractive.... Fabulous local restaurant. Great service, wonderful food. Loved the artichokes!  Fish and veggies were fresh and well cooked!!.

name: El Rinconcito de Juan
address: Calle de Pradillo, 8, 28002 Madrid, Spain
review: Love the huevos rotos con queso azul here; it's great on a chilly night.. Came here because I was at the Bernebeu for a match and didn't want to stay in the area. The food is good, the staff is great and friendly. Try the Tacos de....

name: El Espigón
address: Calle del Capitán Haya, 58, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: Goiko Grill
address: Avenida Alberto Alcocer, 42, 28016 Madrid, Spain
review:
Finally a place in Madrid with salt and seasoning on their burgers and fries.

The food is really good here. It is definitely a go to if you're in Madrid.. It is twice as thick as the "napkin plus" of "Brooklyn Burger", the best hamburger in Korea.
Adding mushrooms to a kevin set is the best combination.
I can.... This is a great spot for a burger. Finding good food in Madrid was a challenge for me. This spot will not disappoint..

name: Naomi
address: Calle de Ávila, 14, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: The best Japanese in Madrid. By far and for a long time. Make a reservation or be ready to wait for a long time.. Very good sushi here. I went to lunch and the restaurant was full. We ordered a sashimi and a nilgiri. The fish was real good.

name: Clos
address: Calle de Raimundo Fernández Villaverde, 28, 28003 Madrid, Spain
review:
***This review was so overdue, please note I visited Spain in October 2022- just getting around to writing all my reviews***


The decor is simple yet.... We came for the tasting menu at lunch time and it did not disappoint! Everything was delicious, and the attention to detail was meticulous. Highly enjoyed.... A great Michelin star experience that will leave you happy and full. The service was also on point. I loved every minute of that experience. The Iberian....

name: Zen Market
address: Avenida de Concha Espina, 1, 28036 Madrid, Spain
review:
We had dinner here last night in Madrid. What a beautiful and cool restaurant! Our table had a view of the stadium and we got to watch a little football..... This is a beautiful restaurant right in the Real Madrid football stadium. Lush greens, totally zen. Menu is varied with lots of dishes to choose from: Thai,.... Depending on the dish the food is average or below average. My dish was chicken that you can find in any 7$ Chinese buffet in the US. 
You can have a view....

name: Furusato
address: Calle de la Reina Mercedes, 22, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review:
Great place fresh, and quiet as well as I sat outside and had a cocktail   Service was excellent and food was absolutely delicious and fresh!. Well appointed Asian Fusion restaurant a bit off the main path. 

We arrived on a lonely Christmas Eve,  but when we left,  at 2230, it was crowded.   Who.... Although the design of this restaurant tries to give the impression of a high-class, high-quality Asian restaurant, most of the dishes I tried here were....

name: Reto
address: Calle de Orense, 68, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: Viejo Almacén de Buenos Aires
address: Calle Ramón Gómez de la Serna, 4, 28035 Madrid, Spain

name: Mesón Txistu
address: Plaza de Ángel Carbajo, 6, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: I just sat in this restaurant for over 20 minutes without being acknowledged by anything more than someone taking away the fourth plate. No one even asked....

name: Volvoreta
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 259, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review:
I am slightly on the lower end of the review scale when compared 4.5 on Yelp and 4.3 on Google.

The service was great.  Not pretentious and for a fancy.... An absolute stunner of a view, great service, fun art, and delicious food - that's the recipe for a great dinner.  We've been joking that Madrid is for....

name: El Jamón y el Churrasco
address: Calle de la Infanta Mercedes, 64, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Yelp is not a big thing in Spain; there are so few reviews of restaurants.  So, I'm glad that I went as part of a group tour where local specialists had to....

name: Piñera
address: Calle Rosario Pino, 12, 28020 Madrid, Spain
review: Excellent dinner at Piñera, on short notice was able to reserve table for a large group on a busy weekend night via concierge at Melia hotel across the....

name: Mikado
address: Calle del Pintor Juan Gris, 4, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: Distrito 798
address: Calle del Capitán Haya, 43, 28020 Madrid, Spain

name: El Quenco de Pepa
address: Calle Henri Dunant, 21, 28036 Madrid, Spain
review:
I was told that Joe Biden dined here the week before I did, and even sat in the seat that I sat in. We were extremely well taken care of and everything that.... Excelente.
Los jitomates nunca había disfrutado de ellos , tienen un tamaño impresionante.
Comi Lenguado y estuvo suculento.
Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
El.... Excelente restaurante, no dejen de comer los tomates. Un clásico en Madrid, excelente servicio..
